displayName.text: NYC Center for Dental Implants - New York

formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S STE 8C, New York, NY 10019, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: NYC Center for Dental Implants - New York

adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S STE 8C, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Very disappointing experience.
Found this place for a dental implant and all went well until the procedure began.
It took literally over a FULL YEAR to get it done and after all the final crown was done 3 times and they never got it right.
(They must use a cheap lab somewhere out there.)
I’m stuck with a very poorly done crown that doesn’t fit neither look nor feel like a natural tooth and I had to seek help somewhere else and spend a couple thousand dollars to fix it and get it done right.

Horrible experience. Huge waist of time and money.

originalText.text: Unfortunately I have bad experience with dr Sol Schwartzstein. He wanted to do implants only. He is concentrating on one thing MONEY. He didn’t wanted to do repairs. He told me best are implants. He also ruined my tooth where I needed only simple feeling , now I need crown. I will never go again to that dentist.

He told me best are implants. He also ruined my tooth where I needed only simple feeling , now I need crown. I will never go again to that dentist.

originalText.text: Very professional and skilled, top to bottom. Cannot recommend them more highly. My hygienist Neta is so thorough and informative, and lets you know every step of the way what’s going on so there are no surprises. Very calming, as well. Thanks to Front desk staff Rosa , and the entire team for quick and easy booking. Going to the dentist is not at the top of my enjoyable things to do but they make it as great as it can be.

text.text: Very professional and skilled, top to bottom. Cannot recommend them more highly. My hygienist Neta is so thorough and informative, and lets you know every step of the way what’s going on so there are no surprises. Very calming, as well. Thanks to Front desk staff Rosa , and the entire team for quick and easy booking. Going to the dentist is not at the top of my enjoyable things to do but they make it as great as it can be.

originalText.text: Dr. Schwartzstein is among the absolute best dental professionals I have ever had the privilege of going to. He is a periodontist but has a thorough understanding of all dental procedures and has an excellent and very friendly staff also. I had an extraction and a dental implant put in and everything went very smoothly and almost painless. In addition, Dr. Schwartzstein is excellent and very thorough in explaining everything that he is doing and why he is doing it. I have never been so impressed with someone in this field. My highest recommendations to Dr. Schwartzstein and his practice as I have referred his website to many friends and colleagues.

text.text: Dr. Schwartzstein is among the absolute best dental professionals I have ever had the privilege of going to. He is a periodontist but has a thorough understanding of all dental procedures and has an excellent and very friendly staff also. I had an extraction and a dental implant put in and everything went very smoothly and almost painless. In addition, Dr. Schwartzstein is excellent and very thorough in explaining everything that he is doing and why he is doing it. I have never been so impressed with someone in this field. My highest recommendations to Dr. Schwartzstein and his practice as I have referred his website to many friends and colleagues.

originalText.text: Dr. Sol was gentle, forthcoming, and thorough. What could have (should have?) been a traumatic and painful procedure (over several visits), was almost a pleasant one. The dentist explained everything in detail, and he exudes calm. That, along with his humble confidence and compassionate demeanor definitely made me feel more relaxed. Most important, the dentist did meticulous work. The office design is beautiful and clean, and the receptionists and assistants were professional and friendly. I VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND this practice; it is worth a visit from anywhere. (In fact we traveled from New Jersey each time.) My only complaint is that I didn't know about this practice sooner.
